scripts.build: pnpm build:types && pnpm build:api && pnpm run build:web & pnpm run build:admin & wait
scripts.web:deploy: cd apps/web && npx wrangler pages deploy .vercel/output/static --project-name=rohan-fullstack-lab
scripts.web:preview: cd apps/web && npx wrangler pages deploy .vercel/output/static --project-name=rohan-fullstack-lab --branch=develop
scripts.web:dev: cd apps/web && npx wrangler pages dev .vercel/output/static --config wrangler.toml
